group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite1]...Synthesize!
[flashEffect:flashWhite1]And cast a spell on Shigurin!
So?!
Did you feel yourself losing motivation this time?!

group_1.textRight: Hmm... I'm fine, I think?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102800:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]For reals?! You don't look "fine" at all!

group_1.textRight: ...After doing the same thing for hours,@I'm not gonna look too lively...
Besides, I'm always like this anyway...@I think you picked the wrong person.

group_1.textLeft: Mm, I know what you're usually like,@but I dunno if I agree...
Try giving me one little shout!

group_1.textRight: Huh...? You're getting unreasonable...

group_1.textLeft: Shigure... D-do your best...!

group_1.textRight: Urgh...
I-I FEEL JUST FIIIINE!

group_1.textLeft: ...@[chara:102800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:102800:cheek_0][chara:102800:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json][chara:102800:motion_300][chara:102800:lipSynch_1]My magic didn't work after all, huh.

group_1.textRight: *Huff*... *huff*...@Yelling kind of wears me out...

group_1.textLeft: Okay, Hagurin's up next...

group_1.textRight: Hawawa...
Hey, Hime, why don't you try changing@the magic you're synthesizing?
I think a change of pace might be what you need.♪

group_1.textLeft: Y'know, that might be just the thing.★
Hagurin's magic isn't gonna work here, though...
Miyurin, what would happen if I used your magic@on someone else?

group_1.textRight: Ummm, I haven't really used it on anyone else,
but I kind of black out@and everything flies by in no time.
For example, if you swept with a broom infused with@Miyu's magic,
it will feel as though you finished cleaning@in the blink of an eye.

group_1.textLeft: That's super amazing! Okay, I'm gonna do that!

group_1.textRight: Um...@It still looks like you're sweeping normally to me.

group_1.textLeft: No matter how many times I try,@it's always a bust, huh...?

group_1.textRight: Something felt different from the first time, though...

group_1.textLeft: Me too. I've been getting more and more@uncomfortable the more times you try...
Because of the magic, maybe...? I don't know...
It's hard to tell since everyone's magics@are all mixing together...

group_1.textRight: Could it be from her using several of our@unique magics...?

group_1.textLeft: B.T.Dubs, Instructor, what's your magic like?

group_1.textRight: ...My magic?
Well... It's excellent for defense, but it's not@something I can show off here.
It's a really strong ability when it comes to fighting!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, that so...?
It's hard to test out Shigurin's magic here, too...

group_1.textRight: S-sorry...

group_1.textLeft: I'm not blaming you at all.@This cutie's the one who messed up.
I rely on Hiko all the time, but he's clueless@when it comes to Magical Girl stuff.
To be totes honest,@I'm lost on what to do right now...

group_1.textRight: Then how about a little change of scenery?

group_1.textLeft: Whatcha mean by that?

group_1.textRight: I'd like you to lend a hand at the Community Center.
We host regular events for the children in the area.
The Youth Association assists with preparations,@but we've been short-staffed.
We've got minigames and food stalls.@It's a lot of fun!
The braised beef stew that Lady San makes@is the most delicious!
Wow! That sounds just like a festival, doesn't it? ♪

group_1.textLeft: Uh-huh... Isn't that a ton of work?@Why would this cutie wanna do that?

group_1.textRight: When you're stuck in a rut,@it's important to get your body moving.

group_1.textLeft: ...Well, you've been letting me camp out here.
And you make a good point, so...@Sure, I'll help out.

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Princess.
To show my gratitude, I'll take any requests@you have for tomorrow's menu.

group_1.textLeft: Then this cutie wants to have curry!

group_1.textRight: Hmhm, leave it to me.
Now then, that's enough for today.
You'll be helping out at the Community Center@starting tomorrow, alright, Your Highness?

group_1.textLeft: No problemo.★
'Kay, I'm gonna head home now. Bye-bye.

group_1.textRight: Thank you for your hard work.♪
Guess we better get going back to Kamihama City...
Shigure, Hagumu, could you stay behind for a bit?
Can you tell me more about that@"uncomfortable feeling" you mentioned?
